Description:
Detects access to a protected_storage service over the network. Potential abuse of DPAPI to extract domain backup keys from Domain Controllers

Author: Roberto Rodriguez @Cyb3rWard0g
Sigma Repository: [GitHub](https://github.com/SigmaHQ/sigma)
Name: Protected Storage Service Access
Query: sourcetype='windows-security' eql select * from _source_ where eventid = '5145' and sharename like '%ipc%' and relativetargetname = 'protected_storage'
